title: # 342 - Diamond Dallas Page, Vance Hinds, & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Diamond Dallas Page and Vance Hinds. If you don't know Vance Hinds lost over 200lbs in a year by doing Diamond Dallas Page's Yoga work out. DDP is a former WWE wrestler who created DDP Yoga to help change people lives. We talk about the journey Vance took to lose so much weight, inspiration, diet, and much more! 

Go to www.DDPYoga.com and check out his workouts! 

This episode is brought to you by Cheers Health. Go to www.cheershealth.com and use the promo code “Bertcast” at checkout for 10% off and a free gift for your first order.

This episode is also brought to you by Shipstation. Try free for 60 days by going to www.shipstation.com. Just click on the microphone at the top of the page and use the promo code “Bertcast"

This episode is also brought to you by Pro Flowers. Get a dozen assorted roses for $19 by going to www.proflowers.com, click the microphone, and enter the promo code “Bertcast”

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Brooklinen. Get 10% off your first order and free shipping by going to www.brooklinen.com and using promo code “Bertcast”

This episode is also brought to you by Mack Weldon. Go to www.mackweldon.com and get 20% off of your first order by entering the promo code "Bertcast" at checkout. 

This episode is also brought to you by 23andMe. This Mothers day for a limited time you can get $30 off their health and ancestry kit by going to www.23andme.com/bert

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on pre sale now! Use the promo code “Shots” to get tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
